item.title: Colocation vs Cloud Services
item.description:
The choice between “make” and “buy” is about deciding whether to handle tasks internally or outsource them. IT managers frequently face this dilemma when contemplating between managing an on-site data center and opting for a colocation facility. Now, there’s a third option: the cloud. While both colocation and cloud services are obtained from external providers, the differences between them are significant from an operational standpoint. Colocation facilities shine by offering a physical space designed for IT needs...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/colocation-vs-cloud-services/
